ModMetaData.name: A Regular Ol' Plumbus
ModMetaData.author: Xercaine
ModMetaData.description: The Plumbus & Kimble© corporation originating from Dimension C-137, now brings you the critically acclaimed Plumbus©! It cooks, it cleans, it floobs! No task is too large for this beloved household item.\n\nThe Plumbus & Kimble corporation is in no way responsible for damages caused by inappropriate use, appropriate use, or irresponsible use of the Plumbus. Warranty is voided at discretion of the The Plumbus & Kimble© corporation. Dark Plumbus isn't real.
